Description: This beautiful two-bedroom home is super convenient for people commuting to Boston or north of the city. Wellington Station is within walking distance. It is available September 1 or sooner. There is parking for two cars and outside space. There is a lovely foyer with a decorative fireplace. The living room is lovely! There is a huge bay window and a built-in entertainment center. The dining room also has some built-in storage. The modern kitchen has granite counters and newer appliances, including dishwasher and disposal. The bedrooms are equal in size and can fit queen sized beds. There is coin operated laundry in the basement. There is a large deck in the back of apartment. It's a great spot for summer entertaining!
